name: The Fig Bore
description:
Hercule Poire is a genius pear detective, but can he solve the case of the Fig Bore, I mean the Big Four?

Controls with arrows keys or WASD, click in the game window if not responding

Made for public domain (bitsy jam #69) with Bitsy Color +

Special thanks to my friend Tako for coming up with the concept and name when I was stumped by the theme!
